channel.title: CVE Feed for activeim -- Marketing Optimizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for activeim -- Marketing Optimizer

item.title: CVE-2024-1976|2024-02-29T05:32:22.330Z -- activeim -- Marketing Optimizer
item.description: The Marketing Optimizer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 20200925. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation via the admin/main-settings-page.php file. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the plugin's settings and inject malicious JavaScript via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
